response.job_title: System Engineer Team Leader en Siemens S.A.
response.summary: Electronic Engineer from the Universidad Nacional from Colombia. A responsible person, proactive, with great learning skills and strong teamwork abilities. Known for his current job at Siemens S.A. in the Energy Automation Division. He has Participated in Hydroelectrics Power Plants Projects as EPM-Playas, Electroperu-Mantaro, CELEC-Marcel Laniado, ENEL-Pangue, EPM-Ituango, ISAGEN-San Carlos, ISAGEN-MIELI. The focus is in Control Projects and Automation areas.
response.skills: C++, Microsoft Office, Generación de energía eléctrica, Controlador lógico programable, Teamwork, Team Leadership, Siemens SICAM 230, Siemens SICAM 1703

profile_positions.description: Proyectos de Modernización del Sistema de Control de Centrales Hidroeléctricas. Etapas de Oferta, Programación, Pruebas FAT y SAT del Sistema. Manejo de Software y Hardware SICAM 1703 de Siemens AG, SICAM 230, SICAM SCC, Digsi 5. Proyectos de modernización de EPM-Playas (3x68MW), Electroperu-Mantaro (7x114MW, 3x70), CELEC-Marcel Laniado (3x71MW), ENEL-Pangue (2x233MW), ENEL-Palmucho(1x34MW), ISAGEN-San Carlos (8x155MW), ISAGEN-MIELI (3x132MW), ISAGEN-Sogamoso (3x273MW), EPM-PorceII (3x135MW), EPM-Ituango(8x300MW). Diseño e implementación del sistema de Control Conjunto de Potencia Activa para el Centro de Operación Integrado de ISAGEN.
profile_positions.title: System Engineer Team Leader

profile_positions.description: Participación en el proyecto de Modernización del Complejo Hidroeléctrico Mantaro de ElectroPeru
profile_positions.title: Auxiliar de Ingenieria

company.name: Siemens
company.description:
Siemens is a technology company focused on industry, infrastructure, transport, and healthcare. From more resource-efficient factories, resilient supply chains, and smarter buildings and grids, to cleaner and more comfortable transportation as well as advanced healthcare, the company creates technology with purpose adding real value for customers. By combining the real and the digital worlds, Siemens empowers its customers to transform their industries and markets, helping them to transform the everyday for billions of people. Siemens also owns a majority stake in the publicly listed company Siemens Healthineers, a globally leading medical technology provider shaping the future of healthcare. In addition, Siemens holds a minority stake in Siemens Energy, a global leader in the transmission and generation of electrical power.
In fiscal 2022, which ended on September 30, 2022, the Siemens Group generated revenue of €72.0 billion and net income of €4.4 billion. As of September 30, 2022, the company had around 311,000 employees worldwide. Further information is available at www.siemens.com.
